metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3192 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Pivotal Spring Framework before 3.2.14 and 4.x before 4.1.7 do not properly process inline DTD declarations when DTD is not entirely disabled, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption and out-of-memory errors) via a crafted XML file. Toshiaki Maki discovered that Spring Framework incorrectly handled certain XML files. A remote attacker could exploit this with a crafted XML file to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.14-1').
